data.prayer: Father, please raise up new apostles to pioneer the growth of the church in Karachay-Cherkess.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Karachay-Cherkess, Russia
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, please give your people in Karachay-Cherkess, Russia a passion for the lost.
data.verse: We are therefore Christ’s ambassadors, as though God were making his appeal through us. We implore you on Christ’s behalf: Be reconciled to God.

data.prayer: Father, like with the Ethiopian Eunuch, set up a meeting today between a faithful believer in Karachay-Cherkess, Russia and a person seeking to understand the truth.
data.verse: The eunuch asked Philip, “Tell me, please, who is the prophet talking about, himself or someone else?” Then Philip began with that very passage of Scripture and told him the good news about Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, let it be said of the 428,141 lost in Karachay-Cherkess that you have called them out of darkness into your glorious light.
data.verse: But you are a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for God’s own possession, that you may proclaim the excellence of him who called you out of darkness into his marvelous light

data.prayer: Lord, please remember the Karachai people. you said you wanted worshippers of every tongue and tribe and nation, yet we know of no worshippers among them.
Spirit, renew the call of John the Baptist in the state of Karachay-Cherkess. Send out bold servants who will call all to repent.
data.verse: Repent, for the kingdom of heaven is at hand.

data.prayer: Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in Karachay-Cherkess, Russia to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.

data.prayer: Lord, help the people of Karachay-Cherkess, Russia to discover the essence of being a disciple, making disciples, and how to plant churches that multiply.
